TEXT.TITLE: BLOCKBUSTER ENTERTAINMENT CORP <BBEC> YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss 1.25 dlrs vs loss 44 cts Oper net loss 2,915,000 vs loss 951,000 Revs 8,131,000 vs 119,000 NOTE: 1985 net excludes 625,000 dlr gain from discontinued operations. Net includes tax credits of 860,000 dlrs vs 285,000 dlrs. Reuter
